about_the_game:
Storyline

The picture-book-loving Little Princess lives happily in the Castle with her best friends Little Seal and Little Sharks day after day. However, the Little Princess, long “Protected” in the Castle, has always been dreaming of seeing the beautiful starry sky depicted in the picture book.
Can you lead the Little Princess and help her find the Starry Sky of happiness?

Game Feature

- No lines between characters, you’ll experience their feelings through body and face expressions as the story progresses.

- Cute, wholesome picture book art style.
- Easy game control, you’ll only need to move and investigate throughout the entire game.
- Play as Little Princess to unpuzzle and explore in the game

Heart-warming storyline enveloped in the content full RPG adventure!!
Simple, detail-orented exploration!

Characters

About

【Title】　To the stars
【Genre】　Wholesome
【No. of Endings】　1
【Playthrough time】　1hour 30 min.
【Development time】　Approx. 6 mo.
【Live streaming, Re-creation】Not restricted
【Download】　Click here to download

“To the stars”───── I’ve drafted the outline of the story quite some time and took some time to make it into a game. The playthrough time is about 90 minutes and no lines, just like how I designed from the beginning.
I somehow barely managed to control the development time with 6 months.

Author:
Fukinshin Brothers
RPG Maker Creator from Taiwan.

Translator:
Gray, aka. @falcon6164. amateur translator.

name: To the stars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50), iOS 8.0, Android 4.4.4*

short_description: The picture-book-loving Little Princess lives happily in the Castle with her best friends Little Seal and Little Sharks day after day. However, the Little Princess, long “Protected” in the Castle, has always been dreaming of seeing the beautiful starry sky depicted in the picture book.
